Description:
Detects the use of the "gcc" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.


Author: Li Ling, Andy Parkidomo, Robert Rakowski, Blake Hartstein (Bloomberg L.P.)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Shell Execution via Rsync - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/rsync' and command like '% -e %') and (command like '%sh 0<&2 1>&2%' or command like '%sh 1>&2 0<&2%') and command like '%/dev/null%')
